title: Rory coaster ride nets Masters win, career Slam
description: Rory McIlroy gave up a big lead on the second nine and bogeyed the 72nd hole to create a tie, but he recovered to edge Justin Rose in a playoff to win the Masters.
author: Mark Schlabach

title: Wild West: Clips clinch 5 seed; Dubs in play-in
description: The Clippers locked up the No. 5 seed with the win and will play the Nuggets. The Warriors fell into the play-in with the loss and will play Memphis in the 7-8 game.
author: Ohm Youngmisuk

title: After a wayward Sunday at the Masters, Bryson DeChambeau is 'super excited' about tweaking his gear
description: Bryson DeChambeau believed his game was in good enough shape to win the Masters. DeChambeau couldn't hit his irons where he was looking and couldn't keep pace with the leaders. “If I just had somewhat of good iron play this week,” DeChambeau said, “it would have been a lot different outcome.”
author: BEN NUCKOLS

title: Watch: Rory McIlroy's home club in Northern Ireland has crazy celebration after Masters win
description: The once young prodigy from Holywood, Northern Ireland, had plenty of support from back home, too.

title: McIlroy beats Rose in Masters play-off to seal career Grand Slam
description: Rory McIlroy achieves golfing immortality as he beats Justin Rose in a sudden-death play-off to finally win his first Masters title and complete the career Grand Slam in a hugely dramatic final round at Augusta National.

title: 'We had to put a smile on his face' - Newcastle dedicate win to Howe
description: Newcastle players and staff dedicate their crushing win over Manchester United to boss Eddie Howe, who missed the match as he is in hospital.

title: McIlroy makes Grand Slam history with dramatic Masters play-off win
description: Rory McIlroy ended his long wait for a fifth major title and completed the career Grand Slam with a dramatic play-off victory over Justin Rose at The Masters.

title: Piastri claims dominant Bahrain win as Russell holds off Norris for second
description: Oscar Piastri completed a flawless victory as George Russell held off Lando Norris for second at the Bahrain Grand Prix.
